verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, Thou and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> with thee shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>; and thou and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> with thee shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H3550>priesthood<s%>.

And thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H4294>also<s%>, the tribe of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H7126>bring<s%> thou near with <S%H3867>thee<s%>, that they may be joined unto <S%H8334>thee<s%>, and minister unto <S%H1121>thee<s%>: but thou and thy sons with thee shall be <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>.

And they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H4931>charge<s%>, and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of all the <S%H168>Tent<s%>: only they shall not come <S%H7126>nigh<s%> unto the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, that they die <S%H4191>not<s%>, neither they, nor ye.

And they shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> unto <S%H8104>thee<s%>, and keep the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, for all the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%>: and a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> shall not come nigh unto <S%H7126>you<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>; that there be <S%H7110>wrath<s%> no more upon the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H3947>I<s%>, behold, I have taken your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: to you they are a <S%H4979>gift<s%>, <S%H5414>given<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

And thou and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> with thee shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> for <S%H1697>everything<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and for that <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%>; and ye shall <S%H5647>serve<s%>: I <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> as a <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H4979>gift<s%>: and the <S%H2114>stranger<s%> that cometh <S%H7131>nigh<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, And <S%H5414>I<s%>, behold, I have given thee the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of my <S%H8641>heave-offerings<s%>, even all the hallowed <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; unto thee have I <S%H5414>given<s%> them by reason of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%>, and to thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>, as a <S%H2706>portion<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

This shall be thine of the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, reserved from the <S%H784>fire<s%>: every <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of <S%H4503>theirs<s%>, even every meal-offering of <S%H4503>theirs<s%>, and every sin-offering of <S%H817>theirs<s%>, and every trespass-offering of <S%H7725>theirs<s%>, which they shall render unto <S%H6944>me<s%>, shall be most <S%H6944>holy<s%> for thee and for thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>.
As the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> things shalt thou <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2145>thereof<s%>; every male shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6944>thereof<s%>: it shall be holy unto thee.

And this is <S%H8641>thine<s%>: the heave-offering of their <S%H4976>gift<s%>, even all the <S%H8573>wave-offerings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them unto <S%H1121>thee<s%>, and to thy sons and to thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with <S%H2706>thee<s%>, as a portion for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; every one that is <S%H2889>clean<s%> in thy <S%H1004>house<s%> shall eat <S%H398>thereof<s%>.

All the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H3323>oil<s%>, and all the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H8492>vintage<s%>, and of the <S%H1715>grain<s%>, the <S%H7225>first-fruits<s%> of them which they <S%H5414>give<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to thee have I given <S%H5414>them<s%>.

The <S%H1061>first-ripe<s%> fruits of all that is in their <S%H776>land<s%>, which they <S%H935>bring<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, shall be <S%H2889>thine<s%>; every one that is clean in thy <S%H1004>house<s%> shall eat <S%H398>thereof<s%>.
Everything <S%H2764>devoted<s%> in Israel shall be <S%H3478>thine<s%>.

Everything that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%>, of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> which they <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, both of <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> shall be <S%H1060>thine<s%>: nevertheless the first-born of <S%H120>man<s%> shalt thou <S%H6299>surely<s%> <S%H6299>redeem<s%>, and the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%> shalt thou <S%H6299>redeem<s%>.

And those that are to be <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> of them from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shalt thou <S%H6299>redeem<s%>, according to thine <S%H6187>estimation<s%>, for the <S%H3701>money<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> (the same is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>).

But the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of a <S%H7794>cow<s%>, or the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of a <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, or the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of a <S%H5795>goat<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H6299>redeem<s%>; they are <S%H6944>holy<s%>: thou shalt <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and shalt <S%H6999>burn<s%> their <S%H2459>fat<s%> for an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of them shall be <S%H8573>thine<s%>, as the wave - <S%H2373>breast<s%> and as the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh<s%>, it shall be thine.

All the <S%H8641>heave-offerings<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7311>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, have I <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H1121>thee<s%>, and thy sons and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with <S%H2706>thee<s%>, as a portion for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: it is a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto thee and to thy seed with <S%H2233>thee<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, Thou shalt have no <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in their <S%H776>land<s%>, neither shalt thou have any <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2506>them<s%>: I am thy portion and thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, <S%H5414>behold<s%>, I have given all the tithe in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2500>for<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, in return <S%H2500>for<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> which they <S%H5647>serve<s%>, even the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

And <S%H5750>henceforth<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall not come <S%H7126>nigh<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, lest they <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%>, and <S%H4191>die<s%>.

But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>; and <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> they shall <S%H5157>have<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

For the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which they <S%H7311>offer<s%> as a <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: therefore I have <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8432>them<s%>, Among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> they shall <S%H5157>have<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Moreover thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3947>them<s%>, When ye take of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you from them for your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, then ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> up a <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> of it for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, a <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H4643>tithe<s%>.

And your <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> shall be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> unto <S%H1715>you<s%>, as though it were the grain of the <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%>, and as the <S%H4395>fulness<s%> of the <S%H3342>winepress<s%>.

Thus ye also shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> a <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of all your <S%H4643>tithes<s%>, which ye <S%H3947>receive<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and thereof ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

Out of all your <S%H4979>gifts<s%> ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> every <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, of all the <S%H2459>best<s%> <S%H4720>thereof<s%>, even the hallowed part thereof out of it.

Therefore thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H7311>them<s%>, When ye heave the <S%H2459>best<s%> thereof from <S%H2803>it<s%>, then it shall be reckoned unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> as the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%>, and as the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H3342>wine-press<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in every <S%H4725>place<s%>, ye and your <S%H1004>households<s%>: for it is your <S%H7939>reward<s%> in return <S%H2500>for<s%> your <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> no <S%H2399>sin<s%> by reason of <S%H7311>it<s%>, when ye have heaved from it the <S%H2459>best<s%> <S%H2490>thereof<s%>: and ye shall not profane the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that ye die <S%H4191>not<s%>.
